channel.title: Dedi server hosting problems
channel.description:
Hi everyone, im x andrew x and I own runemaker online but last week we saved up enough money to but a [u][b]Windows Server 2008 R2[/b][/u], but when we got it and I tried to run my server on it I keep getting errors saying it cant find java but I installed it and everything and I even wrote something to find it and go into my [u][b]programfiles(x86)[/b][/u] to get to it, jre6 works fine but i need it to work with jdk too.
Heres the code i use to run it if anyone can help me out here
[code]@echo off color 0a cd .. title [ RuneMaker Productions ] echo ................................................ echo .. CopyRight RuneMaker Productions 2009-2010 .. echo ................................................ echo .. RuneMaker 317 Is a creation of Andrew F. .. echo ................................................ java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
And heres the error i get.
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
I have my Jdk1.6.0_20 and jre6 here. C:\ProgramFiles(x86)\java
My statement for running the server works 100% fine on a windows xp base, but they won't let me have xp unless I pay them 100$ to set it up so I have to try this first.

item.title: Dedi server hosting problems
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:2, topic:340412”]All compiler errors go here,
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349078.0.html[/quote]

That thread is a lost cause sadly.

@OP
Try

@echo off color 0a cd .. title [ RuneMaker Productions ] echo ................................................ echo .. CopyRight RuneMaker Productions 2009-2010 .. echo ................................................ echo .. RuneMaker 317 Is a creation of Andrew F. .. echo ................................................ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Dedi server hosting problems
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

Did you download java? most vps dont come with jdk installed.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Dedi server hosting problems
item.dc:creator: @runemaker runemaker
item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

Hi everyone, im x andrew x and I own runemaker online but last week we saved up enough money to but a Windows Server 2008 R2, but when we got it and I tried to run my server on it I keep getting errors saying it cant find java but I installed it and everything and I even wrote something to find it and go into my programfiles(x86) to get to it, jre6 works fine but i need it to work with jdk too.

Heres the code i use to run it if anyone can help me out here

@echo off color 0a cd .. title [ RuneMaker Productions ] echo ................................................ echo .. CopyRight RuneMaker Productions 2009-2010 .. echo ................................................ echo .. RuneMaker 317 Is a creation of Andrew F. .. echo ................................................ java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

And heres the error i get.

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.

I have my Jdk1.6.0_20 and jre6 here. C:\ProgramFiles(x86)\java

My statement for running the server works 100% fine on a windows xp base, but they won’t let me have xp unless I pay them 100$ to set it up so I have to try this first.

Read full topic
